channel.title: Metadata on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Metadata on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Organization custom properties now generally available
item.description:
GitHub has made organization custom properties generally available, enabling enterprise administrators to attach metadata to organizations and use those properties to automatically target enterprise rulesets for governance and automation.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Organization custom properties are now available in public preview
item.description:
GitHub announced that organization custom properties are available in public preview. These let you attach metadata to organizations—similar to repository custom properties—to simplify targeting of rulesets and policies across organizations.

  • Source: GitHub
